text: Zbigniew Kuźmiński (4 November 1921 - 12 March 2005) was a Polish film director and screenwriter. He directed more than 25 films between 1950 and 1989. ==Selected filmography== * Milczące ślady (1961) * Drugi brzeg (1962) * Desperacja (1988) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1921 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Polish screenwriters Category:Polish film directors Category:People from Bydgoszcz Category:20th-century screenwriters
title: Zbigniew Kuźmiński
